 : All artists are tired of persuading their nearest and dearest to look      :
 : sad...look glad...look mad...madder...no, even madder...okay, hold it. For :
 : those artists (and their long-suffering friends), here is the best book    :
 : ever. Facial Expressions includes more than 2,500 photographs of 50        :
 : facesÃ¢â‚¬â€men and women of a variety of ages, shapes, sizes, and               :
 : ethnicitiesÃ¢â‚¬â€each demonstrating a wide range of emotions and shown from     :
 : multiple angles. Who can use this book? Oh, only every artist on the       :
 : planet, including art students, illustrators, fine artists, animators,     :
 : storyboarders, and comic book artists. But wait, there's more! Additional  :
 : photos focus on people wearing hats and couples kissing, while             :
 : illustrations show skull anatomy and facial musculature. Still not enough? :
